name: LOOT QUEST KEEPERS GAME
description:
Created during UBISOFT GAME JAM 2017 in Kiev.

A local multiplayer game for 4 people.

Controls:

Keyboard: WASD + Numpad 7, 8, 9
Gamepad: Left stick + A, X, B (should work with non-x360 gamepads too, but may use different buttons)

Gnomes must kick the gamer and pick up his coins to win. Gnomes can kick the lootbox around to save it and help each other get up if stunned.

The gamer must open the lootbox before the gnomes steal all his money to win. He may smash or grab the gnomes to stun them temporarily

Credits:
